name: VR Zombies Combat:Zombie Shooter For VirtualGlasse
name_original: VR Zombies Combat:Zombie Shooter For VirtualGlasse
description:
Enjoy Zombies Shooter in Virtual Reality. They are attacking on you. show no mercy against Zombies. Real Threat.! It is a time to check your reflexes and grip on the Gun.

How to Play:

VR Mode:
- you must have Gyro sensor in your device
- Put your device into VR glasses like 4DUD or Google Cardboard Glasses
- Aline your device into center
- Check for blurriness... rotate lens for proper focus
- Use revolving chair or stand in open place
- Look between your feet to walk/stop
- You are free to move forward/backward and left/right just rotating on your axis
- Also visualize up/down view

Features:
- Virtual reality based 3d environment
- Gyro-meter based 360 degree rotation
- High Resolution realistic graphics
- Beautiful dynamic environment
- No time limit, unlimited play and fun
- Compatible with virtual reality glasses such as Google Cardboard VR and 4DUD
- Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals
